translation.help:
<white>Translations subcommands:
  <dark_gray>• <white>reload: <gray><i>Reloads the translation files.
  <dark_gray>• <white>test <node>: <gray><i>Test a translation.

help.title: Set your character's title
help.desc: Set your character's description, <red><b>512 CHARACTER LIMIT
help.view: View your card, or another player's

error.viewoffline_hasnotjoined: [✖] Player has not joined the server.
error.title: [✖] Title is too long, limited to %max_length% characters only
error.firstname: [✖] First Name is too long, limited to %max_length% characters only
error.lastname: [✖] Last Name is too long, limited to %max_length% characters only
error.suffix: [✖] Suffix is too long, limited to %max_length% characters only
error.gender: [✖] You can only put Male, Female, or Other
error.age: [✖] Age number too low/high, limited to a range of %minimum_age%-%maximum_age%
error.desc: [✖] Description too long, limited to %max_length% characters only
